manual.title: User Guide
manual.description: Learn how to use this app

introduction.title: Overview
introduction.p1: This app integrates Eastern and Western medicine knowledge and uses AI to provide personalized health recommendations.
introduction.p2: It offers two modes: Professional Mode for practitioners and General Mode for everyday wellness.

compendium.title: Herbal Compendium
compendium.p1: Search for information on Kampo formulas, Western herbs, and supplements from an integrative perspective.
compendium.p2: Search by symptom or herb name to get detailed information from both Eastern and Western medicine perspectives.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.p1: This app is not a substitute for medical diagnosis or treatment. Please consult a healthcare professional for health concerns.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.content: This app does not collect or store personal information. Data entered is used only for analysis and is not saved on servers.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.content: By using this application, you agree to the following terms. This service is for informational purposes only and is not medical advice.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: The information provided by this application is for educational and informational purposes only. It is not intended as a substitute for medical diagnosis, treatment, or professional medical advice. Please consult a qualified healthcare professional for any health concerns or symptoms.
